document.text:
From: 
(USANYS)" 
To: Sigrid McCawley 
all==> 
Cc: 
" 
Subject: Rule 412 Motion 
Date: Thu, 28 Oct 2021 23:41:49 +0000 
Attachments: Del_412_Mot.for BSF_Redacted.pdf; 2021.10.28_order re_November_l_Conference.pdf 
Sigrid, 
Attached please find a redacted version of the defense's memorandum of law in support of her Federal Rule of Evidence 
412 motion. This was filed under seal by the defense. Any response is due on November 1, 2021. Likewise, any and all 
responses will also be filed under seal and will not be docketed. The Court also ordered that any in camera hearing is 
tentatively scheduled for November 5, 2021. We are happy to discuss tomorrow. 
I'm also attaching the Court's Order about the November 1 in-person pretrial conference. 
Thanks, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
United States Attorney's Office 
Southern District of New York 
New York, New York 10007 
Tel: 
EFTA00024793
